name: Bowling 10 Balls
description:
Play the ultimate fun bowling game.
Where you have 10 balls to throw into the holes and get the best score.

Once the ball flies off the ramp, you can tilt your device to spin the ball’s flight in midair!

Throw the ball into a rotating hole to double the score.

Features:
- 12 Different Balls.
- Realistic Physics.
- Accelerometer control of the ball in midair.
- GameCenter Support.
- Achievements to unlock.
- Universal App.
